description:
Mr. Gab can`t stop sighing. He fell in love with a beautiful rich girl and tried to impress her by pretending he was rich too, but now he`s regretting it. Capline tells him that all he needs to do is become rich for real, and promises to transform him! She gives Mr. Gab instructions during his date at a fancy French restaurant, but has trouble following the plan. Will Mr Gab`s love blossom this time?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガブハチ先生, またまた恋!?
